1.20.1.1.0.1:
Fixed: Tall Spindlefern producing purple dye in Create compat
Fixed: Stripped Globar Log/Wood not being useable for Create's casings
Changed: Globar Sap Bottle now sits upright Create's belts and depots
1.20.1.1.1.0:
Added: Programmer Art, alternate branch models: either completely flat/straight, or bumpy but without twigs
Fixed: Globar Branches on grown trees now always have the correct 'facing' value
Fixed: Amber and Amber Glass are now considered equal to their Glowing variants w.r.t. rendering
Changed: Adjusted model weights in blockstates json
Changed: Slightly improved performance of the branch model
1.20.1.1.1.1: Fixed: Model overrides not working with ModernFix's dynamic_resources (you might need to reorder your resource packs if you had one of the programmer art packs enabled)
1.20.1.1.1.2: Fixed: Made brewing registry access thread-safe
1.20.1.1.2.0:
Added: Sniffberry vines can now be bone-mealed, which allows them to grow beyond the random max height (you can also break and replant to get a new random max height)
Added: Sniffberry vines can now be trimmed (with shears) to prevent them from growing
Added: Sniffberries can now be harvested via right click
Changed: Slight tweaks to the sniffberry vine growth pattern
Fixed: Porus Globar Logs with Globar Sap in them now have the Porus Globar Log as pick-block item
